Price: $17.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:56:30 UTC – Details)


Quick, Convenient and Hands-Free; the MagicMount is a powerful car phone mount magnetic system for conveniently mounting your smartphone, cell phone or larger smart devices to the dashboard in your vehicle, office, workshop, boat or RV. Lock your cell phone or device in place with this Scosche dash mount car holder featuring a 4-Axis adjustable ball joint neck with lock for optimal viewing at any angle. The integrated cable clips let you neatly connect your cables to the back of the magnetic phone car mount to keep cables from obstructing your view. Its cradle-free design eliminates the need to tighten around your device, just hover your phone magnet near the phone magnetic mount surface and it instantly locks securely in place. These powerful N50 neodymium magnets are very strong magnetic car phone mounts and are still 100% safe for modern smartphones and devices. The low-profile mount safely attaches to your dashboard using the automotive grade base to ensure optimal holding power. Compliment your cell phone automobile accessories with this car phone holder.
Magnetic Phone Holder – Comes with powerful Rare-Earth neodymium phone magnets that provide a secure grip to your iPhone, Android or Tablet. 100% mobile device safe. Simply stick the car mount magnet to the back of your phone case for a secure magnet hold.
Optimal Viewing – With 4-axis, 360-degree adjustable head and enhanced soft touch rubber lock-nut, this magnetic car mount allows viewing from any angle. Provides a great hands free experience.
Convenient Design – Integrated cable clip secures the charging cable to our car cell phone holder for a clean mount. The cradle-free design permits safe, easy one-handed use and access to all controls and ports.
Dashboard Accessories Included – phone mount, MagicPlates, protective film and user manual
Buy with Confidence – Backed by Scoscheâs Lifetime Tech Support and 3-year Warranty

Secure this mount onto any firm, flat and clean surface area

Does not interfere with wireless charging when using the proper MagicPlate placement

The heat resistant automotive grade mounting base will safely secure a Smartphone in your car, home or office

From the brand

Xindell was established in 2016, focusing on the cleaning and maintenance of car windshields, and has professional and meticulous car care products and services, OEM car replacement parts.

Xindell Windshield Cleaner ensure that apart from online avenue, we have a strategic location, investing in state-of-the-art equipment and excellent friendly staff.

What Makes Our Products Unique?

a)Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield

b)Get to the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well

c)Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180Â°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass

d)Fit with the glass surface very well

e)Multiple Uses

f)Anti-skid & Durable

How to Clean Inside Car Windows?

Spray your preferred brand of glass cleaner on the microfiber cleaning cloth and wipe down the inside of the windshield. This should remove what did not come off with just the microfiber cloth.

SHOP XINDELL STORE

Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180Â°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass, which fit with the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, from interior to exterior, easy to use and effortless. Long ergonomic handle, easily extend to hard-to-reach window bases, leaving surfaces for even cleaning.
Multiple Uses: Works great as a fog & moisture removal tool. Easy windshield cleaner is safe to use on all surfaces and wonât scratch, ideal for interior & exterior cleaning, great for cars, such as trucks, SUVs and recreational vehicles of all sizes. The EASY windshield cleaning brush tool also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls and other household needs! Also ideal for de-misting your windscreen in winter. No need to wait your vehicle warm up.
Anti-skid & Durable: The cleaning pad pole use aluminum alloy material, lightweight and wonât rust, more durable than plastic one, the end of the handle is with soft sponge, non-slip and comfortable to hold. 3 pcs Washable & Reusable Pads made of fine fiber fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective. The microfiber cloth helps to remove dirt, dust, and fingerprints on the glass. Great Design Car Window Cleaner!
Special Instructions: âInterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad or spray a small amount of water on the pad and wipe clean. Refrain from drenching the surface or smudges will appear. âExterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad. âFog Removal: simply wipe glass with no added water or liquid chemical. âStubborn stains on the glass: Can be spray a little Glass Cleaning Fluid for wiping. âNo chemical or soap is needed to clean the surface, just a little water.

XINDELL UPGRADE WINDSHIELD CLEANING TOOL

Product Description

Tip:

If the pimple is immature, it is an inflamed pimple that feels stubborn and a little painful. Please do not use any extractor, it will make things worse, wait for the acne to mature and use it.Facial redness, when using makeup remover tools to press the skin, so the face will be partially red after use, but it will all disappear in a short time, no need to worry.Tools that are not sterilized before use or contaminated with skin bacteria may cause acne marks to persist.So wipe with alcohol before and after each use, and always remember – be gentle!

Applicable Skin: Our pimple extractor set is fit on all types of skin, like sensitive face, oily skin, dry skin, especially suitable for acne skin.
Safe Material: The professional blackhead extractor is made of needle stainless steel coating and the anti-slip handle won’t cause allergic issues.
Package: 10 pcs professional blackhead remover tools with a leather case, convenient to store and carry which is suitable in your cosmetic bags or bathroom.
Precaution: we suggest to use the blackhead remover after the acne ripe enough, and please wipe all tools with rubbing alcohol before and after each use. Tip: Please refer to the instruction manual presented by us for the specific operation method.

Tip:

  • If the pimple is immature, it is an inflamed pimple that feels stubborn and a little painful. Please do not use any extractor, it will make things worse, wait for the acne to mature and use it.
  • Facial redness, when using makeup remover tools to press the skin, so the face will be partially red after use, but it will all disappear in a short time, no need to worry.
  • Tools that are not sterilized before use or contaminated with skin bacteria may cause acne marks to persist.
  • So wipe with alcohol before and after each use, and always remember – be gentle!

Product Description

ãAdvanced LED High-Brightness Lamp Beadsã- Mihani adopts a new generation of high-quality LED chips and bright micro-electric technology. The lamp beads have high power, low power consumption, no light decay and color difference, good color rendering, long LED life, high brightness, and positive color temperature, and the 218 LEDs quality for brighter and more saturated light with up to 2500 lm. You can view the light covered area easily at night.
ãUpgraded More Sensitive and Powerful PIR Motion Detectorã- Mihani solar light is equipped with improved motion detection chip and detection angle, adopts improved wireless transmission technology to avoid signal interference from other wireless devices, and has built-in PlR motion sensor with high sensitivity. It able to detect up to 180Â° with a longer sensor length of 30 ft, therefore providing a broader range of lighting.
ãThree Lighting Modes & Multi-Scene Useã- Mihani has 3 lighting modes: Permanent On All Night Mode, Smart Brightness Control Mode and Bright Light Mode, and is also a joy to have with its automatic feature that turns on the light at any sign of movement. It can provide the perfect lighting for your porch, backyard, front door, garage, driveway, walkway, steps and more, and even prevent thieves from entering your door to steal things, giving customers confidence in their safety.
ã All-Weather Resistant& Easy Installationã- Made of durable ABS material, our Mihani solar outdoor lights are designed to withstand extreme weather conditions, and the IP65 waterproof rating ensures that our 3-Head solar safety light won’t yield in rain, sleet or snow. The mode button also has a unique lP65 waterproof protective cover located on the back of the device. The package comes with 2X Installing Screws and 2X Expansion Anchors for easy installation in minutes.
